title: Hotel Rush: Merge Story
description: Hotel Rush: Merge Story is a casual merge game where you join Ted on a journey to uncover his grandfather’s hidden past. As you explore the hotel’s forgotten corners, you’ll merge humble tools into powerful tools, uncover hidden treasures, and piece together family secrets that have been buried for years. Each renovated floor unlocks new challenges, puzzles, and surprises, taking you deeper into a story filled with twists and heartfelt discoveries. With every merge and decoration, you’ll breathe new life into the hotel, transforming it into a masterpiece.
